channel.title: VPS advice
channel.description:
Hello, I need some advice on buying VPS. These are a few of my deals:
[code]Dedicated CPU: 0.4GHz RAM: 256MB Storage: 10GB Bandwidth: 250GB
£15 per month[/code]
[code]18.2 GB SCSI Disc space 800 GB Bandwidth/Mo 20 domains Hosted on HP Proliant DL580 G4 MSSQL/ MySQL 9.95 per month[/code]
[code]up to 4 GB ECC RAM up to 109.2 GB SCSI Disc space up to 3200 GB Bandwidth/Monthly Daily Backups to HP StorageWorks Powerful MSSQL / MySQL 14.95[/code]
I'm looking for a VPS that will keep my server running smooth and have the ability to hold around 40 people smoothly.
